message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I believe it would be highly valuable to you.  Given its worth, I'm proposing an initial price of $11,500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a serious offer. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to negotiate, however. How about we settle at $11,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle at $10,500? I think this is a fair compromise.
